title: Beth and Rip’s Fiery Romance on Yellowstone Solidified Them as One of TV’s Best Couples
description: Beth and Rip were the best part of Yellowstone because they were one of the best couples on TV screens in many years. The post Beth and Rip’s Fiery Romance on Yellowstone Solidified Them as One of TV’s Best Couples appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly

title: Michael and Alex: A Roswell Love Story Written in the Stars
description: Michael and Alex's iconic romance on Roswell, New Mexico deserves some loving on the most romantic day of the year! We're discussing it here. The post Michael and Alex: A Roswell Love Story Written in the Stars appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Whitney Evans

title: Project Runway: Tim Gunn Won’t Return for Freeform Revival, Admits He Was ‘Devastated’ Not to Be Asked Back
description: Sounds like Tim Gunn wasn’t able to make it work with the new Project Runway. Gunn, the fashion guru who served as mentor on 16 seasons of Runway, won’t return for the new Freeform revival, he tells People magazine. What’s more, he wasn’t even asked back, he says, even though his longtime co-host Heidi Klum […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: TVLine Items: D’Arcy Carden Joins Handmaid’s Tale, Nosferatu Sets Peacock Streaming Date and More
description: D’Arcy Carden is going from the Bad Place to the Worse Place. The Emmy Award-nominated actress has been tapped to guest-star in the upcoming sixth and final season of Hulu’s The Handmaid’s Tale, according to The Hollywood Reporter, which adds that her appearance has already been filmed. In addition to her breakout role as The […]
author: Andy Swift
